WELCOME

Fear Not, For I am With You;

How you have found yourself here does not matter, what matter is that you are here! I have created this place in hopes that if you may find some answers that you are looking for. Also a place where you can find my story. Where you can find resources that you, or a loved one may need, or possibly your community may need. This is a location of love and hope. My intention is to spread Suicide Awareness, Mental Illness Awareness, as well as Addiction Awareness. This is something that effects so many people, it does not discriminate. I hope that my story can help you. Whether it motivates you, or just gives you awareness of how these things effect other people. With awareness we can try to make a difference we can try to prevent tragedy.

Here we promote the ideas of self worth. Loving yourself as well as loving those around you. That there is hope that can be found inside the confines of adversity. That we can use the success of others to promote and nurture the strengths within ourselves. We can share our stories, we can make a difference, we can change our surroundings. It may be difficult, you may feel lost, here you are not lost, you are found! We will succeed and will will do so TOGETHER!

Here you can be yourself, and hopefully find what you are looking. You can reach out to me, schedule a time for me to speak at your location. You can find ways to spread this message through merchandise, my book, others books, t shirts, you name it. If you have ideas to further spread this message please contact me.

WHO CARES?

;

WE CARE!
